title: EPAM and Cursor Strategic Partnership
description: EPAM and Cursor announced a strategic partnership on January 8, 2026 to build and scale AI-native teams for global enterprises.

title: Claude Code 2.1 Released with 80+ New Features
description: Claude Code 2.1 released in early January 2026 is a massive update with 1,096 commits and over 80 new features including Shift+Enter for newlines, automatic skill hot-reload, LSP support, forked sub-agent execution, hooks support, language configuration, and token limit optimization.

community_feedback.quote: It's breathtaking how fast the Claude Code team ships
A complete disaster due to the breaking bug in 2.1.0
The biggest productivity upgrade since the tool launched
Claude Code 2.1.0 is a solid update focused on making daily workflow smoother

title: Gemini 3 Flash Available in Visual Studio, JetBrains, Xcode, and Eclipse
description: On January 6, 2026, GitHub Copilot expanded Gemini 3 Flash model availability to Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse, following the initial public preview in December 2025.

community_feedback.quote: Tried Gemini 3 for coding and I'm convinced this thing is either a genius or legally insane

title: Gemini CLI V0.22.0 Released with Gemini 3 Flash
description: Gemini CLI V0.22.0 released in early January 2026 adds Gemini 3 Flash (now available for Free Tier users), Conductor extension plugin, and Endor Labs extension plugin.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Now Default in CLI and IDE
description: As of January 2026, OpenAI's Codex CLI and IDE now default to GPT-5.2-Codex model, described as 'the most advanced agentic coding model for professional software engineering.'

title: Gemini 3 Flash Now Available in Windsurf
description: Windsurf version 1.13.5 released December 27, 2025 adds Gemini 3 Flash model availability, combining Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency.

title: Windsurf Wave 13: Merry Shipmas Edition
description: Wave 13 released December 24, 2025 brings first-class support for parallel multi-agent sessions, Git worktrees support, side-by-side Cascade panes, and makes SWE-1.5 available for free to all users for 3 months.

title: Aider v0.86.0 with GPT-5 and Grok-4 Support
description: Released in late December 2025, Aider v0.86.0 adds support for all GPT-5 models, Grok-4 via multiple providers, Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite, and various UX improvements. Aider wrote 88% of the code in this release.

title: Cursor 2.3 Holiday Release: Stability and Polish Focus
description: Cursor 2.3 released December 22, 2025 focuses entirely on fixing bugs and improving stability, including core agent, layout controls, and code diff viewing improvements. Multiple versions released through January 2026 (2.3.15, 2.3.18, 2.3.20, 2.3.21).

community_feedback.quote: It's just straight-up writing 100% of the code. No hand-holding. 2026 has just begun and it's only accelerating
We've spent the past two weeks fixing bugs and making reliability improvements based on your feedback

title: New Agent Upgrade for All Enterprise Customers
description: All enterprise customers have been upgraded to the newest version of Devin with latest architectural and model improvements. Legacy 'Agent (old)' option removed. Features include new API v3 metrics endpoints and enhanced consumption analytics.

title: Agent Skills Support Added
description: On December 18, 2025, GitHub Copilot added support for Agent Skills, an open standard that works across multiple AI agents including GitHub Copilot in VS Code, GitHub Copilot CLI, and GitHub Copilot coding agent.

title: Gemini 3 Flash Public Preview
description: On December 17, 2025, Gemini 3 Flash model began rolling out to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise plans, available through the Copilot model picker.

title: Instant Edits, GPT-5 Codex Support & Grok Code Fast 1
description: Continue v1.0.38 (JetBrains), v1.1.78 (VS Code), v1.5.8 released November 3, 2025 adds OpenAI Responses API support for GPT-5 Codex, instant edits for find/replace tools, and Grok Code Fast 1 integration.
